import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faBars,faTimes}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);// Detectar scroll para cambiar estilo de la navbar
useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setScrolled(window.scrollY>50);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);const toggleMenu=()=>{setMenuOpen(!menuOpen);};const closeMenu=()=>{setMenuOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar ".concat(scrolled?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",className:"navbar-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text",children:"Tu Amigo Hotelero"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:menuOpen?faTimes:faBars})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-menu ".concat(menuOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Inicio"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#how-it-works",onClick:closeMenu,children:"C\xF3mo Funciona"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#rooms",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Habitaciones"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#testimonials",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Opiniones"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#faq",onClick:closeMenu,children:"FAQ"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:closeMenu,className:"navbar-cta",children:"Contacto"})})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
